attributes.action: STOP WATER POLLUTION IN N. IRELAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
·Stop the ‘Consent to Discharge' into rivers.

·Stop all discharging into Lough Neagh and its rivers (Lough Neagh provides Belfast's and Antrim's drinking water

·Stop consent for building developments near/beside rivers.

·Increase fines to polluters, without warning letters.

·The Environment and Heritage Service to act more quickly after reports of pollution.

·Set up an independent Water Pollution Body.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
